targetStack.hint: The Deck, Hand, or Pile to move a card into.
targetStack.label: Target Stack

keepCanvasCard.hint: Whether to keep any cards moved into this region on the canvas.
keepCanvasCard.label: Keep Canvas Card

MoveCardBehavior.NoGM: No active GM to manage scene data!
MoveCardBehavior.NoStack: Could not find a valid Cards document for this region

CardSheet.ScryingMessageReorder: {name} shuffled the {number} revealed cards back into {deck}.
CardSheet.ScryPromptHint: Choose the amount of cards to scry on from this set of cards.
CardSheet.ScryMoveTop: Sort card to top of deck
CardSheet.ScryMoveBottom: Sort card to bottom of deck

ShowNames.Label: Show Card Owner Name
ShowNames.Hint: Display the owner of each card on the canvas

OwnerFontSize.Label: Font Size
OwnerFontSize.Hint: Font size of the text displayed if "Show Card Owner" is checked

OwnerTextColor.Label: Text Color
OwnerTextColor.Hint: Text color of the text displayed if "Show Card Owner" is checked

OwnerTextAlpha.Label: Text Alpha
OwnerTextAlpha.Hint: Text alpha of the text displayed if "Show Card Owner" is checked

SceneConfig.CanvasPileHint: Treat the entire canvas as a card pile. Regions with the Allocate Card type will override this within their coverage.

Warning.CardDrawn: This card cannot be added to the canvas as it has already been drawn and added to a pile or hand.
Warning.FailCanvasDeck: The top card of this deck is already on the canvas. Move it to a another card stack, such as with a region, to draw a new card.
Warning.NoCopyCutPaste: Canvas cards cannot be copied, cut, or pasted.
Warning.NoCopyPaste: Canvas cards cannot be copied and pasted.
Warning.DeckOwnerNotFound: No owner of the deck was found to be able to perform this action.
Warning.NoScryDrop: You can't drop external cards on the scrying dialog

FromStack.label: From
FromStack.hint: Stack of cards to draw from.

ToStack.label: To
ToStack.hint: Stack of cards to play to.

Face.label: Face
Face.hint: Optionally force cards onto their first face or back.

OffsetX.label: X Axis Offset
OffsetX.hint: Offset for the top left of the layout from the top left of the scene bounds.

OffsetY.label: Y Axis Offset
OffsetY.hint: Offset for the top left of the layout from the top left of the scene bounds.

Rows.label: Rows
Rows.hint: Number of rows, limited by the size of the current scene.

Columns.label: Columns
Columns.hint: Number of columns, limited by the size of the current scene.

Direction.label: Direction
Direction.hint: Which way to point the triangle.
